actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-213.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 5840, a bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 in order to extend the authorities of that Act and improve the administration of export controls under that Act, and to strengthen the antiboycott provisions of that Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5840 (Export controls).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 5840, a bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 in order to extend the authorities of that Act and improve the administration of export controls under that Act, and to strengthen the antiboycott provisions of that Act.
